securityDescription: JIBI provides a secure and reliable architecture for handling all your financial transactions, ensuring the utmost protection for your data and assets.
integrationDescription: JIBI seamlessly integrates with CMI (Core Banking System) through web services, enabling you to authorize payments, manage account creation, and perform other financial transactions with ease.
manageBillPaymentTransactions: Manage your bill payment transactions easily
featuresDescription: JIBI offers a comprehensive suite of features to simplify your banking experience.
agentBackOfficeDescription: Subscribe agents and customers to benefit from the bill payment service.
customerSpaceDescription: Access your customer wallet to pay bills, check balances, and manage your account.
cmiWebServiceDescription: CMI acts as a Core Banking System, allowing customer payment authorizations.
profileInfo: This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.
aboutDescription: Write a few sentences about yourself.
permanentAddress: Use a permanent address where you can receive mail.
notificationsInfo: We'll always let you know about important changes, but you pick what else you want to hear about.
commentsDescription: Get notified when someones posts a comment on a posting.
candidatesDescription: Get notified when a candidate applies for a job.
offersDescription: Get notified when a candidate accepts or rejects an offer.
pushNotificationsInfo: These are delivered via SMS to your mobile phone.

testimonials.quote: JIBI has revolutionized the way I manage my business finances. The P-Wallet feature is a game-changer!
testimonials.name: John Doe

testimonials.quote: I love how easy it is to pay my bills and manage my account with JIBI. The customer wallet is so convenient!
testimonials.name: Jane Smith

testimonials.quote: As an agent, the JIBI back office makes it so simple to onboard new customers and manage their accounts.
testimonials.name: Michael Johnson
